title:
A Short Proof that the number of $(a,b)$-parking functions of length n
  $a(a+bn)^{n-1}$
abstract:
We give a very short proof of the fact that the number of $(a,b)$-parking
functions of length $n$ equals $a(a+bn)^{n-1}$. This was first proved in 2003
by Kung and Yan, via a very long and torturous route, as a corollary of a more
general result. This new version contains a reference to previous work kindly
communicated by Richard Stanley
